alternative_title: How to apply for a digital tachograph company card
body:
$!Apply to DVLA for a digital tachograph company smart card.$!

As an operator, you need a card to download data from the [digital tachographs](/tachographs/digital-tachographs "Digital tachographs") in your vehicles. 

##How to apply

Complete application form D779B and post it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download 'D779B - Application for a digital tachograph company card' (PDF, 120KB)](http://www.dft.gov.uk/dvla/forms/~/media/pdf/forms/D779B.ashx "Download an application for a digital tachograph company card (PDF, 120K)")
$D

You can also use this form to:

* change the name or address on your cards
* replace lost, stolen or damaged cards
* renew expired cards

###By post

You can [request an 'ST2A' application pack in the post.](https://www.dvla.gov.uk/dvla/onlineservices/order_forms.aspx "Ask DVLA to send you an application pack for a driver digital smart card."){:rel="external"}

###By phone

Call DVLA for an 'ST2A' application pack.

$C
**DVLA**   
0300 790 6109. 
$C

## Northern Ireland

In Northern Ireland you can get application forms for company cards from the Driver & Vehicle Agency (DVA). 

$C
**DVA licensing enquiries**  
<dvlni@doeni.gov.uk>  
0845 402 4000
$C

Visit [nidirect](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/digital-tachograph-company-cards "Digital tachograph company cards in Northern Ireland"){:rel="external"} for more information.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
*[DVA]: Driver & Vehicle Agency
